attributes.action: STOP ROULETTE ON OUT STREETS THIS IS FIXED AND IS RUINING FAMILYS LIVES
attributes.additional_details: GAMBLING SHOPS TURNING UP EVERYWHERE ON OUR HIGH STREET BECAUSE OF THE TREMENDOUS ADDICTION TO ROULETTE. NICKNAMED THE CRACK COCAINE OF GAMBLING, MONEY BEING FALSLEY TAKEN AWAY FROM THE POOR TO FEED THE GREADY RICH. PLEASE PUT A STOP TO THIS

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
